pr_title: [SCB-2082] add separated switches for metricsEndpoint and healthEndpoint

timeline.bodyText: Maybe keep default value to true is better?
timeline.author: liubao68

replies.bodyText: Under the security sensitive circumstances, the users only want to expose their business REST interfaces. If we keep the default value to be true, they may expose these two REST interfaces by mistake.
replies.author: yhs0092

replies.bodyText: I think these two interfaces do not have any sensitive information. And if the application is secrured , the two interfaces will be secured too. I don't know why explode the two interface will cause security issue.
replies.author: liubao68
